basics.name: I'm Ruslan Prokhorov
basics.label: and I'm Senior anykey ...
basics.summary: Information technology is not a job. This is a lifestyle, it's when you evolve what you like and what brings pleasure, always and everywhere. Now I am developing automated tests on Python and studying everything related to testing and auto-test. Previously, I was engaged in the creation and maintenance of its infrastructure in small companies. I had to create the infrastructure from scratch, had to maintain the existing one, as well as to make modernization. My area of interest also includes information security.
